cast.overview: A young boy wins a tour through the most magnificent chocolate factory in the world, led by the world's most unusual candy maker.
cast.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory

cast.overview: After his impetuous musician girlfriend, Samantha, dies in an accident shortly after they had a fight (and nearly broke up), Ian Wyndham, a grief-stricken British businessman living in London gets a chance to relive the day all over again, in the hope of changing the events that led up to her getting killed.
cast.title: If Only

details.biography:
Oscar James (born 25 July 1942) is a Trinidadian actor, who is based in the United Kingdom. He is best known for his role in EastEnders as Tony Carpenter, for over two years. James resides in north London.

James was born in Trinidad, and had a poor upbringing. He came to the United Kingdom in the 1950s. He initially worked as a taxi driver, a dish-washer and also a gymnast, but he always had aspirations to be an entertainer and followed his dream by becoming an actor.

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
details.name: Oscar James
details.place_of_birth: Trinidad, British West Indies [now Trinidad and Tobago]
